articles.title: Live updates: Haley and DeSantis praise Trump as smiling ex-rival looks on - BBC.com
articles.description: The failed challengers for the Republican nomination voice full support for his candidacy in a clear display of unity at the party convention.
articles.content:
Brandon LivesayReporting from the convention
We're wrapping up our live coverage for the night here at day two of the Republican convention in Milwaukee.

articles.title: Eternal Day and Night: Webb’s Journey To Understand a Distant World’s Bizarre Atmosphere - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Near-infrared spectral analysis of terminator confirms differences in morning and evening atmosphere. Since the first exoplanet was discovered in 1992, thousands of planets orbiting stars outside of our solar system have been confirmed through a myriad of dif…
articles.content: Researchers using the James Webb Space Telescope have uncovered atmospheric differences on the exoplanet WASP-39 b, revealing temperature variations and distinct cloud cover across its tidally locked… [+10506 chars]

articles.title: DIY kits could boost cervical-cancer checks by one million - BBC.com
articles.description: One million more women would have life-saving checks if the NHS adopted self-testing, researchers estimate.
articles.content:
By James Gallagher, @JamesTGallagher, Health and science correspondent, BBC News
The cervix is the canal joining the vagina and the womb
